### Title 杨辉三角

##### 1 emphasis

- 杨辉三角

  

##### 2 key points

##### 4 code

```cpp
// 计算前 30 层杨辉三角
void init() {
    int N = 30;
    vector<int> g[N + 1];
    for (int len = 1; len <= N; len++) {
        g[len].resize(len);
        g[len][0] = g[len][len - 1] = 1;
        for (int i = 1; i < len - 1; i++) {
            g[len][i] = g[len - 1][i - 1] + g[len - 1][i];
        }
    }
    for (int len = 1; len <= N; len++) {
        ll sm = 0;
        for (auto& e : g[len]) {
            cout << e << " "; 
            sm += e;
        }
        cout << "(" << len << " || " << sm << ")" << " ";
        cout << "\n";
    }
}
```

```cpp
// 打印杨辉三角(预估数据量)
void init() {
    int N = 20;
    // 正三角
    vector<ll> g[2 * N + 1];
    for (int len = 1; len <= N; len++) {
        g[len].resize(len);
        g[len][0] = g[len][len - 1] = 1;
        for (int i = 1; i < len - 1; i++) {
            g[len][i] = g[len - 1][i - 1] + g[len - 1][i];
        }
    }

    // 反三角
    for (int len = N + 1; len <= 2 * N; len++) {
        int l = g[len - 1].size() - 1;
        if (l <= 0) break;
        g[len].resize(l);
        for (int i = 0; i < l; i++) {
            g[len][i] = g[len - 1][i] + g[len - 1][i + 1];
        }
    }
  
  	// 打印
    for (int i = 1; i <= 2 * N; i++) {
        cout << "level:" << i << " --- ";
        for (auto& e : g[i]) {
            cout << e << " ";
        }
        cout << "\n";
    }
}
```
